title: Himi 373
lyrics:
10.10.10.10.10.10.
Ko e ‘Alo’i ‘o Sīsū
(Luke 2)
1.
Kāinga ‘ā, kuo ‘alo’i ē
He ‘Eiki ‘o māmani fulipē.
‘Ā pē ‘o hiva hono hakeaki’i,
He hā ‘a e ‘Eiki ko e tamasi’i.
Si’i toki pō ka fakamanatua,
Ne hoko ‘o kakano ‘a e ‘Otua.
2.
He misiteli lahi taha ē,
‘Afio he ‘Otua hā sino pē.
Ne’ine’i ne maama ai ‘a e tu’uapō,
‘O hivehiva ‘a e kau ‘āngelo.
Kāinga ‘ā ‘o kau pē mo e langi
Ke fakahikihiki he ‘ofa ni.
3.
“Fanongo, pea ‘oua ilifia,
He ko e tala fakafiefia.
Kuo fānau’i ‘i he kolo na
Ha tama tupu ‘ia Tevita:
Ko e Kalaisi mo e ‘Eiki la;
Te ne huhu’i homou ngaahi hia.”
4.
Pea ne toki pā ‘a e hiva ē
Hangē he lea ha fu’u hōsitē.
“He me’a ē ka ongoongo ai
‘A e ‘Eiki ‘i he loto hēvani.
Pea ‘e hoko ‘a e melino lahi
Ki he kakai kotoa pē ‘o māmani.”
5.
Pea ne toki lele pē ki ai
‘E he kau tauhi sipi ke vakai.
Na’e ‘ikai ‘ilo ia he palasi,
Pe ko e fale ‘o ha ‘eiki lahi:
He fale manu ne ne nofo ai,
‘O ne tokoto he ‘ai’angakai.
6.
Ē, ke tau fakalaulauloto muʻa
He ʻofa lahi ‘a hotau ‘Otua.
Ne tuku ‘a e tuʻunga fakatuʻ
i,
‘O nofo tuʻ
a
ko hotau f
a
k
a
mo’ui.
Tau topuvaʻe taha pē mo ia,
Kae ‘oua pē ke a’u he kolōlia.*
